## DatabaseConnection.addClientInfo() method

Add clientinfo to be passed on to database

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of the client info. |
|  value | any | The value of the client info. |
